title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-3.1 - Storage Vessels
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 203-3.1 - Storage Vessels

State Regulations
(a) Applicability: The requirements of this section apply to all storage vessels located at oil
and natural gas well sites with a PTE greater than or equal to six (6) tpy of
VOC. (b) Control requirements
(1)

Storage vessels installed prior to

January 1, 2023 must have a vapor control efficiency of ninety-five (95)
percent. (2)

Storage vessels
installed on or after January 1, 2023 must not vent to the
atmosphere. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
203-3.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 16, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 07, eff. 3/3/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
